name: Otto Dersch
content: Otto Georg Dersch (born March 17, 1848 in Ortenberg, Hesse)[1] was a German mathematician who worked in algebraic geometry. Dersch got his Ph.D. 1873 in Gießen. He was teacher in  Groß-Umstadt and Darmstadt and then director of a secondary school in Offenbach am Main, and then became director of a secondary school (Oberrealschule) in Darmstadt until at least 1915.[2]

Otto Georg Dersch (born March 17, 1848 in Ortenberg, Hesse)[1] was a German mathematician who worked in algebraic geometry. Dersch got his Ph.D. 1873 in Gießen. He was teacher in  Groß-Umstadt and Darmstadt and then director of a secondary school in Offenbach am Main, and then became director of a secondary school (Oberrealschule) in Darmstadt until at least 1915.[2]

Publications[edit]
Dersch, O. (1874), "Doppeltangenten einer Curve nter Ordnung", Mathematische Annalen, 7: 497–511, doi:10.1007/BF02104919
Dersch, O. (1894), Geschichte der Grossherzoglichen Real-und Landwirtschaftsschule zu Gross-Umstadt in den 25 Jahren ihres Bestehens, G. Lindauer
References[edit]


^ Jahrbuch des höheren Schulwesens, 12, B. G. Teubner, 1891, p. 136.

^ Bölling, Reinhard (2013), Das Fotoalbum für Weierstraß / A Photo Album for Weierstrass, Springer-Verlag, p. 47, ISBN 9783322802811.
